page.title: 14Recreation in a Mining Area
page.content: For active people{Denaby Main}isn't the place to live.Recently the council built a{B.M.X. course}which is not much good for children whose skills need improving. There is a hobby for people of a peaceful nature they study {ornithology}at Denaby Ings,a natural beauty spot with a good selection of birds.Cricket and swimming are popular .There is a {football club}and bowling greens,one better equipped than the other.Mostly people of sixty or more enjoy this pasttime.For the younger generation there is a youth club,they hold discos,a snooker challenge.At{Tom {Hill}there is {boxing}three nights weekly.Many{working mens clubs}and pubs are usually busy all hours.A converted cinema is a bingo hall and whist is played in the clubs.An enjoyable hobby is pigeon flying, another is cultivating allotments.
